summary.para: A -typed value that specifies the context for the query.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies query behavior.
A -typed value that specifies the type of query.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DESC1.Query
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the type of query.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DESC1.MiscFlags
member.summary: A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies query behavior.

member.name: D3D11_QUERY_DESC1.ContextType
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the context for the query.
